item.title: Setting Up
item.description: So finally it’s done ! The blog is up and running. This website is written in Sublime Text and compiled into HTML using Hugo - a static site generator in Go. For the design, it uses a minimal framework called CleanWhite. Lastly, Git is used to publish on Github, where all the code for this website is freely available. Cheers!
